text: bil aznn aladhin aktasabuu alsayyaati, wkdhdhabu rusul allaha, wakhalifuu 'amr rabihim, waeabaduu ghayraha, 'an najealahum kaladhin amanuu biallaha, wasadaquu rusulah waeamiluu alsaalihati, wa'akhlasuu lah aleibadat dun sawahan, wnsawyahm bihim fi aldunya walakhirata? sa' hakamahum bialmusawat bayn alfujaar wal'abrar fi alakhrt
